        KPMG is a global network of independent professional services firm with deep expertise in the provision of audit, tax and advisory services to clients in various industries and sectors of the economy. The Firm is well represented in Nigeria and across the African continent, with the objective of providing exceptional and quality services to multinational, regional and local clients and to enhance the product offerings in certain previously under-serviced markets.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Marketing Specialist

Job Location: Lagos

About the job
     

            
    




	We are looking to recruit a Marketing Specialist for one of our clients, a leading beauty company with operations in Lagos, Nigeria.


Job Summary


	As a Strategic Marketing Specialist, you will lead brand visibility, customer acquisition and revenue growth across all channels and markets leveraging effective marketing strategies whist protecting profitability.


Key Requirements


	Minimum of a Bachelor’s Degree; Master’s Degree or MBA preferred.
	5-8 years of leading sales in consumer goods in Beauty, FMCG, or a related field
	Proven track record of delivering customer growth and revenue improvement
	Hands-on expertise with marketing platforms, tools, web analytics, and simple business intelligence reporting.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to barakat.fasasi@ng.kpmg.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Salary & Benefits


	?N200,000 monthly salary
	?N10,000 data allowance.


Method of Application

External Supply Sales Representative Job at Hermes Oil Services Limited




        
    

        
        Hermes Oil Services Limited, an energy and logistics company with expertise focusing on haulage of petroleum products, bulk sales, supply & distribution, safety practices & PPE supply, petroleum station & LPG plant infrastructure design, construction and operations. We are a subsidiary of Gasland Nigeria Limited, one of the largest indigenous companies in the LPG sector of the oil and gas industry with over 25 years of experience and over 40 locations nationwide.
     

            
    



Hermes Oil Services Limited is a trusted supplier of Automotive Gas Oil (AGO) and other petroleum products, committed to meeting the energy needs of corporate organizations, industrial users, and retail clients. At Hermes Oil Services Limited, we specialize in the bulk supply and prompt delivery of AGO to power generating sets, industrial equipment, and other operational needs. We understand how critical uninterrupted power and fuel availability are to your business, and we have structured our operations to ensure timely supply, consistent quality, and competitive pricing.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: External Supply Sales Representative

Job Location: Iwo, Oyo
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	The Supply Sales Representative at an AGO Station is responsible for driving sales of automotive gas oil (diesel fuel) and other related products.
	This role involves engaging with customers, understanding their needs, and providing exceptional service to ensure customer satisfaction and repeat business.
	The representative will also be involved in maintaining inventory levels, processing sales transactions, and ensuring compliance with safety and environmental regulations.


Sales and Customer Interaction:


	Engage with customers to identify their fuel needs and provide product information.
	Process sales transactions accurately and efficiently.
	Build and maintain customer relationships for repeat business.


Inventory Oversight:


	Track and manage inventory levels of AGO and related products.
	Coordinate with suppliers for timely stock deliveries.
	Assist in stock counting and record maintenance.


Marketing Efforts:


	Participate in promotional activities to increase sales.
	Inform customers about ongoing promotions.
	Provide feedback on market trends and customer preferences.


Operational Tasks:


	Maintain cleanliness and organization in the sales and storage areas.
	Follow safety and environmental protocols.
	Prepare sales reports and documentation as required.


Compliance and Safety:


	Adhere to company policies, safety regulations, and environmental standards.
	Conduct regular safety inspections and report hazards.
	Ensure compliance with all safety guidelines.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: anne.tiolu@hermesoilservices.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note


	Cndidates expereinced in sales roles within the oil and gas industry are highly preffered
	Job is fully onsite in Ibadan (Accomodation to be provided for candidates outside of Ibadan).
